OrgName: Aperio CI, Inc. (formerly Intelecom Systems, Inc.)
activities: We do not currently have an employees in the EU.  However, our privacy policy agrees to abide by the EU Data Privacy Laws. The main portion of the data we receive from the EU is as a data processor for telecommunications companies. We currently analyze call detail records of a telecommunication's company customers and help develop marketing programs based upon our analysis.  The analysis is mainly focused on price comparisons of various plans currently available from the telecommunications company and determining which is the "best plan" for a particular telecommunications customer, based upon their individual or an entity's calling patterns. We have also developed website applications for EU telecommunications company, so that their commercial customers can view their employees telephone bills, among other applications as well.
personaldata: all of the above, except human resources data
recoursemech: We will cooperate with the European Union Data Protection Authorities (DPAs).
